title: Student-Led Investment Program Implementation: Experiential Learning-Based Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic financial analysis, investment principles, and corporate financial management
context.additional_context: Education applying the operational system of student-led investment programs and ethical decision-making processes for science field corporate managers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the investment portfolio construction and management process using an experiential learning model.
Learners can establish and execute risk management strategies through team-based decision-making.
Learners can write and present project reports reflecting ethical investment principles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
